name: Supplication Verses in Quran
description: Supplication Verses in Quran is an Islamic mobile application contains all supplications verses in the holy Quran sorted as per the holy Mushaf, also there is a simple explanation translated into several languages Features 1-Free 2-No Ads 3- No Internet 4- Simple explanations 5-Explanations in several languages(Arabic,English,French, Spanish,Urdu and Indonesian) And it is possible to add other languages in the coming versions  5- H.D MP3 audios, voice of Sheikh Maher Almuaakly Imam of the haram Al Makki 6-Sharing with friends through social medias 7-Generic bookmark 8-Several wonderful backgrounds   We always welcome your comments and suggestions, Please do not forget to evaluate and share.
